name: Jason
summary: An experienced software engineer with a strong track record of developing and delivering products. Constantly seeks innovative solutions to everyday problems in a fast-paced environment. A quick learner and intensely interested in software development, project management, data analysis, and business process analysis. Eager to develop new skills while maximizing critical and analytical skills to make meaningful contributions to the organization.

works.title: Backend Software Engineer
works.description:
• Responsible for the design and development of systems in the Global E-Commerce Funding Center domain, including billing, settlement, statement, tax, finance, and other sub-domains
  • Participate in the design, development, and construction of Global E-Commerce financial systems and payment technology platforms to build a safe, reliable, stable, and efficient financial system with strong fund security
  • Lead multiple projects to support regional business operations and ensuring regulatory compliance across regions, including SEA, EU, UK, US, and LATAM
  • Build global operational capabilities for the fee application management, boosting weekly regional expense operations efficiency by up to 80%
  • Support implementation of data exchange controls to ensure secure, compliant, and reliable cross-region communication

works.title: Software Engineer
works.description:
• Managed the marketplace backend system, with responsibility for money management as the key revenue generator
  • Designed and implemented services in a microservices architecture to ensure quality, reliability, and compliance for a platform serving over 21 million sellers and 100 million buyers
  • Provided high performance, availability, and scalability services to process the high volume of requests, handling more than 7.5 million daily transactions or USD 1.5+ billion monthly
  • Wrote high-quality production code in Go and built robust workflows for systematic monitoring
  • Integrated in-depth data analysis knowledge with a solid understanding of business and industry practices
  • Supported on-call operations and dove into deep layers of code to identify and resolve problems
  • Partnered with IT Security and DevOps teams to implement application security testing (SAST & DAST)
  • Collaborated with data team to democratize AI & big data across modules and technology teams
  • Contributed to cost optimization by conducting R&D, achieving cost savings of up to USD 256,000 annually
  • Led post-acquisition migration and integration for the funding center domain

works.title: Senior Programmer
works.description:
• Provided technical leadership in a fast-moving environment and write high-quality code, mainly in Java and .NET
  • Partnered with system administrators, business, and legal teams to ensure compliance and manage the risk factors
  • Led ownership of the core system, ensuring reliability and stability of financial and administrative services for 45,000+ students and 4,500+ staff and lecturers
  • Collaborated with external parties and served as point of contact for system production and technical issues
  • Analyzed business requirements and coordinated the development and release planning across multiple projects
  • Applied deep knowledge of products, technologies, and businesses to build the solutions
  • Assisted in in-depth code reviews to maintain high development standards
  • Deployed, monitored, and maintained a high standard of delivery quality
  • Supported the complex technical issues and mentor mid and junior programmers

works.title: Programmer
works.description:
• Managed and coordinated the full development lifecycle (enhancements and new projects)
  • Worked closely with analysts, operations team, and business stakeholders to build new solutions
  • Created development standards, implemented advanced design patterns and test-driven development (TDD)
  • Conducted in-depth code reviews to promote modularization and maintain high development standards
  • Performed, debugged, and fixed frontend and backend issues
  • Developed clear user manuals

works.title: Junior Programmer
works.description:
• Managed the core system, primarily built on Java, .NET, and Oracle ERP
  • Developed and maintained the frontend and backend of Oracle-based applications
  • Performed R&D and conducted proof-of-concept for new solutions
  • Drove automation, testing, and tooling to improve data quality

education.description:
• Master track program, the beginning of master's studies intersect with the preparation of the bachelor's thesis
  • Honor: magna cum laude
  • GPA: 3.88/4.0

certifications.name: Google IT Automation with Python Specialization
From Data to Insights with Google Cloud Specialization

voluntaries.organization: Coding Camp powered by DBS Foundation
voluntaries.description:
• Conducted online instructor-led training (ILT) with approximately 50 university students across Indonesia per session, covering both theory and hands-on materials
  • Imparted industrial knowledge of data and machine learning technologies and their implementation
  • Facilitated online collaboration and mentoring sessions for capstone projects
  • Prioritized critical aspects of machine learning projects, identifying key areas for teams to focus on for maximum impact
  • Provided actionable feedback and technical advice to enhance the quality of machine learning models and implementation
  • Guided students to achieve global standards and qualifications
  • Achieved high participant satisfaction with rating 4.7/5.0 for ILT and 5.0/5.0 for mentoring sessions
